## 问题重述

$$
Y = I(X_1\ge \frac 12)
$$

待解决的问题

- 为什么贝叶斯误差率为0.

## 生成数据

```{r}
## generate dataset X
genX <- function(N, p = 10){
  sapply(1:p, function(i) runif(N))
}
## generate dataset Y
genY <- function(X, id = 1){
  if (id == 1){
    apply(X, 1, function(x) ifelse(x[1] < 0.5, 0, 1) )
  }
  else if (id == 2){
    apply(X, 1, function(x) ifelse(prod(x[1:3]-0.5) > 0, 1, 0) )
  }
  else{
    cat("WARNING! Incorrect id for problems.")
  }
}
```
